src_original: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśam,  saced bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭaśca praśnavyākaraṇāya /
evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmiṃstathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yadyadevākāṅkṣasi /
ahaṃ te tasya tasyaiva praśna(sya)  vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣyāmi //

atha khalu tasyāmeva parṣadi suvikrāntavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /  sa utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya  yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ
